question:
Many manufactured food and drink products contain high levels of sugar, which causes many healthy problems. Sugary products should be made more expensive to encourage people to consume less sugar.


Do you agree or disagree?
text: A bunch of produced food, drink or soda outcomes have extreme degree of carbohydrates which generates many health issues and economists underline that sugary products should be sold or re-product more costly because of causing people to restrict devouring little sugar. Furthermore, these notions are being debated by many manciples, but still, they have no distinct idea about this context and now, we attempt to compare agreements and disagreements.

However, if the entrepreneurs raise the price of sugary products, there will find many critics in order to commence this plan and there are lots of drawbacks to driving up carbohydrate products. For instance, your life system will modify in consequence of this circumstance and you will strive to make further money by purchasing sugary outcomes these have an obsessive molecule that human wants without any limits and this may originate anxiety inside the population.

Contrary to these sentences, there are sufficient occasions that, when the government or business establishments drive up sugary manufacture accidently , the health of our society will be improved on account of valuable sugary commodities. For example, you become aware of the people who prefer drinking coffee with carbohydrate foods. Totally, It diminishes the benefit of coffee. Consequently, it will not be a surprising fact, if scholars notice sugar is a harmful product.

In conclusion, I disagree with increasing the commercial price of sugary and the government should search for another solution in order to deal with these misunderstandings they have to legislate a relevant law for balancing all harmful sides of sugary outcomes.
